item.title: Is Even or Is Not Even
item.description: However, when I look closely to the code, I realized something wasn’t right. I can’t find the original post, so this is what I remember. The function is short so I believe I won’t mess anything up. function isEven(n: number) { return (n ^ 1) === (n + 1); } In Javascripts, a number can be an integer, decimal, or NaN, or Inf or event BigInt. But let’s assume we only use this for integer.
